channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WPB Advanced FAQ
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WPB Advanced FAQ

item.title: CVE-2023-0370|2024-08-02T05:10:55.646Z -- unknown -- wpb%20advanced%20faq
item.description: The WPB Advanced FAQ WordPress plugin through 1.0.6 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
